title: HOUR 2: The Knicks Lose Another Lottery
itunes:title: HOUR 2: The Knicks Lose Another Lottery
description:
Jason Smith and Rob Parker talk about the Knicks losing yet another NBA Draft lottery and weigh in on the league’s shocking decline in ratings. Did Adam Silver make the right decision pushing back the 2021 NBA season? Plus, the guys talk about the differences between FOX Sports Radio and ESPN Radio! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
